// client/src/components/Rent.jsx import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; const Rent = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [properties, setProperties] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // Mock data for rent properties const rentProperties = [ { id: 3, title: "Cozy Apartment for Rent in Hamburg", price: 1200, description: "Cozy 2-bedroom apartment in central Hamburg. Recently renovated with modern amenities.", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568605117036-5fe5e7bab0b7?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=640&q=80", location: "Hamburg", bedrooms: 2, area: "85m¬≤" }, { id: 5, title: "Modern Studio in Cologne", price: 850, description: "Modern studio apartment in the center of Cologne. Perfect for students or young professionals.", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580587771525-78b9dba3b914?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=640&q=80", location: "Cologne", bedrooms: 1, area: "45m¬≤" }, { id: 9, title: "Modern Loft in Leipzig", price: 1100, description: "Industrial-style loft in a converted factory building. High ceilings, exposed brick, modern kitchen.", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1579862750593-34e3310956c7?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=640&q=80", location: "Leipzig", bedrooms: 1, area: "75m¬≤" }, { id: 13, title: "Luxury Apartment in Berlin Charlottenburg", price: 2200, description: "Luxury apartment in Berlin's upscale Charlottenburg district. High-end finishes, concierge service.", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512917774080-9991f1c4c750?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=640&q=80", location: "Berlin Charlottenburg", bedrooms: 2, area: "110m¬≤" }, { id: 15, title: "Studio Apartment in Hamburg City Center", price: 950, description: "Compact and efficient studio apartment in the heart of Hamburg. Perfect for singles or students.", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568605117036-5fe5e7bab0b7?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=640&q=80", location: "Hamburg City Center", bedrooms: 1, area: "40m¬≤" }, { id: 18, title: "Modern Apartment with Balcony in Frankfurt", price: 1400, description: "Bright and airy modern apartment with balcony overlooking the city. 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom.", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1600607687939-ce8a6c25118c?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=640&q=80", location: "Frankfurt", bedrooms: 2, area: "90m¬≤" } ]; useEffect(() => { setProperties(rentProperties); setLoading(false); }, []); const handleContactOwner = (property) => { alert(`Contact Owner: ${property.title}\n\nName: ${getRandomName()}\nPhone: +49 (0)40 635 5427\nEmail: agent${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100)}@hausgold.de`); }; const getRandomName = () => { const maleNames = ["Thomas Schmidt", "Michael Wagner", "Andreas Becker", "Markus Hoffmann", "Christian Schulz", "Daniel Meyer", "Stefan Weber", "Alexander Klein", "Matthias Braun", "Jan Fischer"]; return maleNames[Math.floor(Math.random() * maleNames.length)]; }; if (loading) { return (

); }; export default Rent;
